ipm_solution.title: Combat Fall Armyworm Naturally
ipm_solution.description: Plant Desmodium between maize rows to 'push' pests away, and Napier grass around your field to 'pull' them there.

ipm_solution.title: Control Aphids Without Chemicals
ipm_solution.description: Create a simple, natural pesticide by mixing Neem oil with water and a little soap. Spray it on your tomato plants.

ipm_solution.title: Protect Your Cabbages
ipm_solution.description: Planting marigold flowers alongside your cabbages can repel the Diamondback moth and other pests.
